entry.title: No watches or warnings in effect, Muncho Lake
entry.summary: No watches or warnings in effect.

entry.title: Sunday night: Periods of snow. Low minus 6.
entry.summary: Periods of snow except a few wet flurries over western sections early this evening. Local amount 5 to 10 cm. Wind up to 15 km/h. Low minus 6. Wind chill near minus 8. Forecast issued 4:00 PM MST Sunday 23 April 2023

entry.title: Monday: Periods of snow. High minus 1.
entry.summary: Periods of snow ending near noon then cloudy with 60 percent chance of flurries. Local amount 2 cm. Wind up to 15 km/h. High minus 1. Wind chill near minus 8. UV index 2 or low. Forecast issued 4:00 PM MST Sunday 23 April 2023

entry.title: Monday night: Chance of flurries. Low minus 7. POP 60%
entry.summary: Mainly cloudy. 60 percent chance of flurries early in the evening. Wind up to 15 km/h. Low minus 7. Wind chill minus 5 in the evening and minus 10 overnight. Forecast issued 4:00 PM MST Sunday 23 April 2023

entry.title: Tuesday: A mix of sun and cloud. High plus 1.
entry.summary: A mix of sun and cloud. High plus 1. Forecast issued 4:00 PM MST Sunday 23 April 2023
